data.title: Rolo Tomassi post new music online
data.text:
ROLO TOMASSI have posted a new song called ‘Old Mystics’ on their Facebook page.

It’s the A side of a forthcoming single, and you can hear it by heading to http://www.facebook.com/rolotomassiofficial?v=app_178091127385.

The band have also announced new members, and made a statement about the release:

“Old Mystics is the new 7” single from Rolo Tomassi.

The track, which is backed with b-side Mesmerizer, is the first to be recorded with new members Chris Cayford and Nathan Fairweather, who have recently joined the band. This follows the departure of Joe Nicholson and Joe Thorpe from the band. Bassist Nathan Fairweather plays in Brontide, while guitarist Chris Cayford joins from No Coast.

Old Mystics, which was recorded with Hysterics producer Jason Sanderson, is the first track to be released ahead of the band’s third studio album, which will be released later this spring.

The single will be physically released on March 26 2012, but if you pre-order it you will receive both tracks as MP3s immediately.

Released via Destination Moon Records.

Tracklisting:

A) Old Mystics

B) Mesmerizer

Head to http://rolotomassi.bigcartel.com/product/old-mystic-7 to pre-order the single and get your downloads.
